definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: Transregional inspection shall be organized by a higher-level TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 跨區域徵費稽查的，由上一級交通徵費稽查機構組織。

sentences.english: Transregional inspection shall be organized by a higher-level TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 跨區域徵費稽查的，由上一級交通徵費稽查機構組織。

sentences.english: The inspectors soon saw through his scheme to avoid paying income tax.
sentences.chinese: 稽查員一眼就看穿了他企圖逃避繳納所得的詭計。

sentences.english: Any other vehicle on which exemption is granted on the approval of the Provincial TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 經省交通徵費稽查機構覈准免徵的其他機動車。

sentences.english: Some 200 inspectors were dispatched across the nation for closer inspections.
sentences.chinese: 約200名稽查員被派遣至臺灣各地做更仔細的檢視。

sentences.english: This tax inspector was demonstrating one of the most common of human frailties .
sentences.chinese: 這位稽查員，顯露出一種最常見到的人性的弱點。

sentences.english: Have post-clearance audit in the last year and the result is good, including;
sentences.chinese: 最近一年接受過海關稽查，且稽查結果正常，包括。

sentences.english: Have post-clearance audit in the last year and the result is good, including;
sentences.chinese: 最近一年接受過海關稽查，且稽查結果正常，包括。

sentences.english: The taxman taxed his strength in order to levy surtax on the waxworks.
sentences.chinese: 爲了對蠟像館徵收附加稅，稅務稽查員費盡了力氣。

sentences.english: Managing the convention department administer the symposium, and inspect the series work tangible achievements of member.
sentences.chinese: 主持召開部門管理討論會，稽查組員的工作實績。

sentences.english: It is reported that the company is under investigation by the local inspector of taxes.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，這家公司正在受到當地稅務稽查員的調查。

sentences.english: The accounts have to be audited by a firm of external auditors.
sentences.chinese: 這些賬目必須由一家外聘審計員的公司來稽查。

sentences.english: Are issuing fines the only thing environmental inspectors do?
sentences.chinese: 環境稽查是否就是大家所謂“開罰單”的簡單工作呢？

sentences.english: Lily: No, the police have found evidence.
sentences.chinese: 不，稽查人員發現了證據。

sentences.english: Don't audit life, show up and make the most of it now.
sentences.chinese: 不要稽查自己的生活，秀出和充分利用你的當下。

sentences.english: The customs inspectors are inspecting the outgoing baggage.
sentences.chinese: 海關稽查員正在檢查出關的行李。

definition: to investigate thoroughly/to carefully inspect/to verify/to ferret out (undesirable elements)
to suppress smugglers/to search for smuggled goods
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to search for and seize (criminals, smuggled goods etc)
